title: 12. Your Company is planning to migrate all Java web applications to Google App Engine. However, you still want to continue using your on-premise database. How can you set up the app engine to communicate with your on-premise database while minimizing effort?
alternatives: A. Setup the application using App Engine Flexible environment with Cloud Router to connect to an on-premise database.
B. Setup the application using App Engine Standard environment with Cloud VPN to connect to an on-premise database.
C. Setup the application using App Engine Standard environment with Cloud Router to connect to an on-premise database.
D. Setup the application using App Engine Flexible environment with Cloud VPN to connect to an on-premise database.
